mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rn, TMP.* FROM ( SELECT qna_no, qna_title, qna_target, qna_answer FROM qna CONNECT BY PRIOR qna_no = qna_target START WITH qna_target IS NULL ORDER SIBLINGS BY qna_no DESC, qna_no ASC ) TMP ) WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10
mapper.insert: insert into qna(qna_no, qna_title, qna_content, qna_answer) values (#{qnaNo}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContent}, #{qnaAnswer})
